title: Munakata Kyouju Ikouroku: Daiei Hakubutsukan no Boukan
original_name: 宗像教授異考録 大英博物館の冒険
sinopse:
“The Stonehenge megaliths have been stolen!?” So exclaims Professor Munakata at the outset of a rollicking adventure set at the British Museum, a bizarre plot to force the repatriation of the museum’s prized objects.
(Source: The Economist).

Information can be found under more info.
